clinical_highlights.title: Safety Leader
clinical_highlights.note: The model successfully identified 145 out of 149 pituitary cases.

clinical_highlights.title: Screening Reliability
clinical_highlights.note: When the system predicts 'No Tumor', it is accurate 93% of the time.

clinical_highlights.title: Diagnostic Challenge
clinical_highlights.note: Significant visual overlap between these two classes remains the primary confusion point.
